metadata.Title: CVE-2007-4774 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The Linux kernel before 2.4.36-rc1 has a race condition. It was possible to bypass systrace policies by flooding the ptraced process with SIGCONT signals, which can can wake up a PTRACED process.

notes.Note: tyhicks> Fixed prior to the start of git history by https://osdn.net/projects/linux-kernel-docs/scm/git/linux-2.4.36/commits/bdcb9a96032e26339dbf4aeb26ac8e81541fc7db

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
